title: genome_annotator pipeline - params.input schema
description: Schema for the file provided with params.input

sample.errorMessage: Sample name must be provided and cannot contain spaces

genome.errorMessage: Genome fasta file must be provided, cannot contain spaces and must have extension '.fa', 'fna' or '.fasta' (possibly gzip compressed)

bam.errorMessage: BAM file cannot contain spaces and must have extension '.bam'

proteins.errorMessage: Protein Fasta file cannot contain spaces and must have extension '.fa', 'faa' or '.fasta' (possibly gzip compressed)

gtf.errorMessage: GTF file cannot contain spaces and must have extension '.gtf'

hintsfile.errorMessage: Hints GFF file cannot contain spaces and must have extension '.hintsfile.gff'

ref_gff.errorMessage: Current reference annotation file cannot contain spaces and must have extension '.gff' or '.gtf'
